definition: the mental state of being preoccupied by something
details:
noun
- the mental state of being preoccupied by something
= synonyms: preoccupancy
- complete attention
= synonyms: immersion
- (chemistry) a process in which one substance permeates another
= synonyms: soaking up
- (physics) the process in which incident radiated energy is retained without reflection or transmission on passing through a medium
= example: (physics) the process in which incident radiated energy is retained without reflection or transmission on passing through a medium
- the process of absorbing nutrients into the body after digestion
= synonyms: assimilation
- the social process of absorbing one cultural group into harmony with another
= synonyms: assimilation
